page.title: 20GAMES WE PLAY
page.content:
TIG is a game played outside by ten or more people. One person is "On" and he has to chase and catch another person and then that person is "On". The first person is free and runs away.The one that is "On" has to catch someone else and the game continues.
DEAD LIONS is a game played by any number of people who have to lie down on their backs and pretend to be dead. Someone goes round making sure that you do not move because if you do you are out. The last person lying perfectly still wins the game.
CHUCKY is a game in which you need twelve people and a ball. Make two teams with six on each side of the school yard. You throw the ball and if you do not catch it,it is one point to the other team.
